name: Burrito Time
description:
Help feed the hungry townsfolk in this arcade shooter!

Using your Queso Cannon 9000, burrito-ize as many people as possible before the timer expires. Refill on burritos in the restaurant when you run out!

Installation

Download the release zip file and extract, should be able to run the executable file right from the directory.

If needed, install the Unreal Engine 4 Prerequisites from \Engine\Extras\Redist\en-us\UE4PrereqSetup_x64.exe

Controls

  • WASD: Move
  • Shift: Run
  • Space: Jump
  • Right Click: Aim
  • Left Click: Fire
  • R: Reload
